title: 9/13/17 - "America Needs a Plea not a Scolding"
description:
America needs a 'plea' not a 'scolding' ...'radical right' vs. 'radical left' ...Should we start prepping for civil war?...Top 5 warnings... a 'cold' civil war ...Anxiety-ridden America ...Nancy Pelosi: They’re coming for the ‘Dreamers’ ...Journalist Michael Moynihan joins the show to talk about the dangers of cutting off service for Nazi websites...Here comes the new $1,000 iPhone X...The government is beholden to Apple? ...Hollywood cheapskates donate for hurricane relief...Stevie Wonder: You ‘Must Be Blind or Unintelligent’ To Not Believe in Global Warming.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
